name: Stickman tournament
description:
Stickman Tournament is a fast paced 2d shooter game, basically a follow up of Unreal Tournament, made in 2d, where stickmans are fighting each other in various arenas. All UT modes are gonna be implemented, Death Match and Team Deathmatch is already available in game. The game can be played in a web browser (link in profile) and is fun to play anywhere, at home, at office or even when you are sitting with your laptop in a boring meeting room :) Multiplayer is not yet fully working, I am currently working on it.

Controls: Move WASD, tab to display score and numbers to change weapons
